source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a night-time aerial view of an airport. The runways and taxiways are illuminated with green and white lights, and the terminal building is also lit up. The surrounding area is dark.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a night-time aerial view of an airport. The runways and taxiways are illuminated with green and white lights, and the terminal building is also lit up. The surrounding area is dark.

bad_caption: A group of cyclists rides along a sunlit coastal road, weaving between palm trees and passing by beachgoers. The lead cyclist signals a turn, and the group gradually veers left, continuing their ride parallel to the shoreline.
